Name: LU 882 - Zoning, 185-17 Hillside Avenue Rezoning, Queens (C 210192 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210192 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 882).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

November 23, 2021 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
LOCATING ENVIRONMENTAL REVIEW MATERIALS FOR CERTAIN LAND USE APPLICATIONS
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - November 23, 2021

RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca, Jr. and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, 18517 Hillside LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 15b, changing from an R3X District to an R7A District, changing from an R6A District to an R7A District, establishing within a proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, and establishing a Special Downtown Jamaica District (DJ), which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of a nine-story mixed-use building with residential and commercial uses located at 185-17 Hillside Avenue in the Jamaica Estates neighborhood of Queens, Community District 8 (ULURP No. C 210192 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on October 8, 2021, its decision dated October 6, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 210193 ZRQ (L.U. No. \ul 883\ulnone ), a zoning text amendment to extend the boundaries of the Special Downtown Jamaica District (DJ), enable Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) provisions within DJ, and modify Appendix F to establish an MIH Area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 20, 2021;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Negative Declaration issued May 3, 2021 (CEQR No. 20DCP075Q) which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-591));\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-591).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210192 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 15b:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 1.\tab changing from an R3X District to an R7A District property bounded by a line 140 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, a line 100 feet westerly of Chelsea Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, and Dalny Road;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 2.\tab changing from an R6A District to an R7A District property bounded by a line 100 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, Chelsea Street, Hillside Avenue, and Dalny Road; \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 3.\tab establishing within a proposed R7A District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 140 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, a line 100 feet westerly of Chelsea Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, and Dalny Road; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 4.\tab establishing a Special Downtown Jamaica District (DJ) bounded by a line 140 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, a line 100 feet westerly of Chelsea Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Hillside Avenue, and Dalny Road;\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\f0 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated May 3, 2021, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-591, Community District 8, Borough of Queens.\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on ______________, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
